front.title: Tallon Roll
front.gametext: Target two starfighters (your TIE/ln and any Rebel starfighter) present at same system or sector. Each player draws destiny. Opponent totals destiny and starship's power. You total destiny, TIE's power and TIE's maneuver. Lowest total loses starfighter.
front.lore: Maneuver named after Adar Tallon, tactician of the Old Republic who revolutionized starfighter combat. Pursuing fighter rolls and turns, maintaining speed and target lock.

combo: Tallon Roll + unique TIE/ln with matching pilot + Lateral Damage
